LandingHero.title: Simple, Clear Pricing for your Surgery
LandingHero.subtitle: We make healthcare easy to understand. You will know the exact price before treatment. Our trusted doctors provide quality care at fair prices - no hidden costs.
LandingHero.contactButton: Need help? Contact us to plan your care

MidPageCTA.title: One simple price. No surprise charges or fees.
MidPageCTA.subtitle: Contact us now to talk with our team and book your visit

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.step1: Our care coordinators communicate with all parties to orchestrate your surgical procedure planning, making the process seamless.
HowItWorks.step2: We collaborate throughout your surgical journey, saving you time and money while ensuring the highest quality care.
HowItWorks.step3: Get transparent, cost-efficient pricing with custom surgical bundles tailored to your specific needs.

cardPayment.title: When paying by card for our surgery package:
cardPayment.processingFee: There is a 3.5% card processing fee
cardPayment.selfPay: This only applies to self-pay patients (not using insurance)
cardPayment.example: For example: A $100 bill becomes $103.50 with card payment

pleaseNote.title: Please Note:
pleaseNote.allCards: Card fee applies to all major credit cards
pleaseNote.cashPricing: Special cash pricing is not available with insurance or Medicare

SurgeryCategorySection.title: Search Procedures by Category
SurgeryCategorySection.miscLink: Click here to learn about miscellaneous procedures and specialties

SpecialtyProcedures.title: Specialty Procedures
SpecialtyProcedures.subtitle: The following procedures and specialties may be offered. Please contact us to learn more about availabilty and pricing

SurgicalNavigation.title: Surgical Navigation Solution
SurgicalNavigation.subtitle: What is Surgical Navigation?
SurgicalNavigation.description1: Hinkapin Health's Surgical Navigation Solution is an innovative service designed to enhance patient care, reduce healthcare costs, and improve overall client satisfaction. Our comprehensive solution offers a seamless process for surgical procedures, ensuring that patients receive the best care at the most affordable rates.
SurgicalNavigation.description2: Our solution simplifies the surgical process, from initial patient contact to postoperative support, providing personalized care coordination, cost-effective options, and quality assurance throughout the journey.

initialContact.title: Initial Patient Contact
initialContact.content: Patients can reach out to us as soon as surgery is recommended, allowing for proactive engagement.

careCoordination.title: Personalized Care Coordination
careCoordination.content: Dedicated coordinators manage all aspects of the patient's surgical journey, improving outcomes and reducing stress.

insurance.title: Insurance Verification
insurance.content: We identify and verify the patient's surgical coverage details, ensuring clear communication of benefits and potential costs.

costEffective.title: Cost-Effective Options
costEffective.content: Patients are provided with multiple surgical options, detailing cost differences and considering travel if necessary.

secondOpinion.title: Second Opinion Service
secondOpinion.content: For significant procedures, we offer a second opinion service (at a cost) to enhance decision-making confidence.

postOp.title: Postoperative Support
postOp.content: Our navigators provide ongoing support until the first postoperative visit, ensuring proper recovery and addressing any issues.

SurgicalNavCTA.title: Ready to Get Started?
SurgicalNavCTA.consultation: Work with a patient care coordinator and get a consultation booked.
SurgicalNavCTA.contact: Scan the QR code or click the arrow to contact us, or call us today at

tpa.title: TPA (Third Party Administration)
tpa.description: We collaborate with TPAs to streamline the administrative process and ensure efficient claim management.

brokers.title: Health Brokers
brokers.description: Our partnership with health brokers helps in providing comprehensive solutions to their clients.

patients.title: Insurance Patients
patients.description: We work directly with insured patients to navigate their coverage and find the best surgical options.

includesList.supplies: All medications and supplies for surgery

notes.pathologyNote: *May vary on a case-by-case basis, as determined by the surgeon at the time of consultation.
notes.overnightStay: *If an overnight stay is required, an additional fee will be incurred.
notes.insurance: *We do not accept public or private insurance plans for self-pay patients
notes.cashPrice: Note: Cash prices apply to patients who pay the entire fee in advance, and will likely not count toward an insurance deductible. If you choose to have a claim filed, either for private insurance or government insurance (Medicare, Medicaid, etc.), the quoted cash rate does not apply to you. The cash prices offered are possible because advance payment eliminates 1) the expense of processing claims and 2) the risk of non-payment of fees. Prices include applicable facility, physician, and anesthesia fees. Additional fees may be charged for complication or comorbidity.

ProcedureContactForm.title: Schedule a consultation for {procedureName}
ProcedureContactForm.subtitle: Fill the form below to connect with our patient care coordination team and get a primary consultation booked.
